Always the last to enter the class and first to leave.
Group assignments? They just add their name at the end!
Experts in sleeping with eyes open during lectures.
Always have snacks hidden in their bags.
Can complete homework five minutes before submission.
Known for creative excuses for missing assignments.
Have the most legendary nicknames for teachers.
Best storytellers when caught by the teacher.
Attendance management is an art for them.
Always ready to crack jokes in serious moments.
Can turn a boring lecture into a fun one.
First to bring memes about teachers in group chats.
Survive entire semesters with borrowed notes.
Despite all, they have the best college memories!
